item.title: Jail
item.dc:creator: @ShadowShaft ShadowShaft
item.description:
@ShadowShaft wrote:

if (command.startsWith("jail") && (playerRights >= 3)) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.teleportToX = COORD IN JAIL; p.teleportToY = COORD IN JAIL; p.heightLevel = 0; p.updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported "+p.playerName+ "to jail."; p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to jail."); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you..."); } }

Declare this

[code]public void isInJail() {
if(isInJail == true) {
teleblock = true; //or teleblock(); IDK
removeAllItems();
}

public boolean isInJail() {
if ((absX >= x && absX <= x2) && (absY <= y && absY >= y2)) return true;
return false;
}[/code]

Change the coords to the area you want as jail … Put the tele command to any coords inside the jail area … They will get teleblocked … So they cant tele … if they logout to and theyre stuck

Read full topic

item.title: Jail
item.dc:creator: @ShadowShaft ShadowShaft
item.description:
@ShadowShaft wrote:

Well im not always around voids i’ll post my newest thing (under construction)

[code]/**

  • @(#)announcement.java
  • @author ShadowShaft
  • @version 1.00 2007/7/8
  • @Shadow Productions © Shadow Team , 2007
    */

import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.awt.Container;
import javax.swing.;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.awt.;
import java.awt.event.;
import java.io.;
import java.util.*;
import javax.swing.JTabbedPane;
import javax.swing.ImageIcon;
import javax.swing.JLabel;
import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JComponent;
import javax.swing.SwingUtilities;
import javax.swing.UIManager;
import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Dimension;

public class announcement extends JFrame implements ActionListener
{

protected JTextArea textArea;
protected JTextField textField;
public JFrame frame;
public boolean started = true;
private PlayerHandler c;
private final static String newline = "\n";

private final static String announcement = "[Announcement]: ";
public String date = new SimpleDateFormat(“MM/dd/yyyy”).format(new Date());
public String time = new SimpleDateFormat(“hh:mm:ss”).format(new Date());

public static void main()
{
new announcement();
}

public announcement() 
{

	try 
	{
	     gui(true);
	  }
	  catch(Exception e)
	  {
	  	gui(false);
	}
}

public void gui(boolean show) 
{

	int windowWidth = 600;
	int windowHeight = 250;
	frame = new JFrame("Server Console");
	textField = new JTextField();
	textArea = new JTextArea();
	textArea.setEditable(false);
	JTabbedPane tabbedPane = new JTabbedPane();
    	ImageIcon icon1 = createImageIcon("Images/console.png");
	ImageIcon icon2 = createImageIcon("Images/announcementgui.png");
   		JComponent Announcement = new JTextArea();
	frame.setBounds(100, 200, windowWidth, windowHeight);
	frame.setResizable(false);
  		frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(WindowConstants.HIDE_ON_CLOSE);
	frame.setVisible(show);	
	frame.add(textField, "South");
    	frame.add(tabbedPane);
    	tabbedPane.setTabLayoutPolicy(JTabbedPane.SCROLL_TAB_LAYOUT);
        tabbedPane.addTab("Announcement", icon2, Announcement,
            "Announcement Gui");
	textField();
	
}

public void textField() {
int windowWidth = 10;
int windowHeight = 10;
    textField.addActionListener(this);
}

public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent evt) {
    String text = textField.getText();
    textArea.append(announcement +  text + newline);
logs(text, "AnnouncementSave");
c.messageToAll = (announcement + text);
    textField.selectAll();
textArea.setCaretPosition(textArea.getDocument().getLength());
}

	public void textArea() {
		color(textArea, Color.blue, Color.black);

    Font f = new Font("Comic Sans MS", Font.PLAIN, 12);
    textArea.setFont(f);

    textArea.setEditable(false);
}

public void color(JTextArea name, Color f, Color b) 
{
	name.setForeground(f);
	name.setBackground(b);
}

public void logs(String i, String path)
{
BufferedWriter bw2 = null;
String location = “./data/”+ path +".txt";

  try 
  {
   File bwt = new File(location);
   bw2 = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(location, true));
   bw2.write("On "+ date +" At "+ time);
   bw2.newLine();
   bw2.write(announcement + i);
   bw2.newLine();
   bw2.newLine();		
   bw2.flush();
  } 
  catch(IOException e) 
  {
  	announcementsave();
  }
}

public void announcementsave() 
{
   BufferedWriter bw2 = null;
   String location = "./data/AnnouncementSave.txt";

  try 
  {
   File bwt = new File(location);
   bw2 = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(location, true));
   bw2.write("On "+ date +" At "+ time +" Error with public void logs(String,String)");
   bw2.newLine();
   bw2.flush();
  } 
  catch(IOException e) 
  {
  	textArea.append(" Error to save Announcement()");
  }
}

protected static ImageIcon createImageIcon(String path) {
    java.net.URL imgURL = announcement.class.getResource(path);
    if (imgURL != null) {
        return new ImageIcon(imgURL);
    } else {
        System.err.println("Couldn't find file: " + path);
        return null;
    }
}
protected JComponent makeTextPanel(String text) {
    JPanel panel = new JPanel(false);
    JLabel filler = new JLabel(text);
    filler.setHorizontalAlignment(JLabel.CENTER);
    panel.setLayout(new GridLayout(1, 1));
    panel.add(filler);
    return panel;
}

}
[/code]

Dont steal or your dead Will make some errors for the icons
